title: Natural Language Understanding
text: Accurately interprets complex text, questions, and commands in real time.

title: Contextual Reasoning
text: Maintains awareness of prior inputs to deliver coherent, relevant, and logically consistent responses.

title: Data Summarization
text: Condenses large volumes of text or documents into clear, concise summaries.

title: Text Generation
text: Produces structured or creative text outputs, such as articles, explanations, or code, with controlled tone and precision.

title: Information Extraction
text: Identifies key details, entities, and relationships within text for analysis or automation.
